details.title: Experience thrilling sporting moments with Sky Sports Mobile TV.
details.text:
Enjoy Sky Sports Mobile TV Pack 2, including all the extra Sky Sports channels, for only £5.00 per month.

  • Enjoy Pack 2 of Sky Sports Mobile TV, including all the extra Sky Sports channels.
  • Pack even more sports into your life and never miss live coverage of your favourite sports.
  • Available only on iPhones and selected Android phones.

For just £5.00 extra per month

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: To continue, you must agree to the terms & conditions.

accordion.label: Info on Sky Sports TV
accordion.text:
Subscription

Get unlimited access to Sky Sports 3 & 4, F1 and Sky News with Pack 2.

Internet charges

For internet charges whilst roaming and for internet charges outside of your allowance, standard internet charges apply to your plan. Usage will be taken from your internet allowance.

Stopping the subscription

You will be charged £5 a month and you can cancel anytime by going to http://offers.vodafone.com/gb and selecting manage subscriptions.

Supported devices and limitations

Sky Sports TV is only supported on Android and iPhones. In order to activate the subscription with Vodafone for the first time, the device must be connected to the mobile network using the SIM card linked to this subscription.

success.title: What happens next?
success.text:
Congratulations, you’re now ready to get your Sky Sports Mobile TV app and start watching some great sport.

Download the Sky Sports Mobile TV app from your app store, open the app, select ‘I subscribe to Mobile TV with Vodafone’ and follow the instructions to start watching live sport on the go.

Please note, you need to be on the Vodafone network for the first time you access the app. Remember to switch off WiFi.
